WorkItem.Description: So i set up WSUS Package Publisher as i have done before and it doesn't seem to work correctly. I haven't tested if the updates are installing yet, but i need Status to work first. I send "Detect Now" and "Report Now" for all the computers for my Flash update packages, but the Status for all of them is Unknown. What could be the issue?

Comments.Message: WPP just read and display the status from WSUS server. Ensure that computers are able to talk to your Wsus server. Try to launch a detection directly from a computer.
